title: Superior performance of silicon nanowires@void@carbon on a conductive substrate as a scalable binder-free anode electrode for lithium-ion batteries
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00314D, Paper
Mohammadreza Yasoubi, Alireza Habibi, Soraya Hoornam, Zeinab Sanaee, Shams Mohajerzadeh
First report on silicon-nanowires@void@carbon grown on a conductive substrate through a scalable fabrication process, with excellent specific capacity, cycle life, and rate performance.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
